name: C05-M0 (Cosmo)
description:
C05-M0, or Cosmo as he is known, isn't your average cat.

For starters, he's a robot with the ability to talk, and second, he needs batteries to function. 

When his owner and creator leaves for a convention, he eagerly awaits her return for 3 days. 

Worried at how long she has been away, Cosmo decides to look for her himself...

Controls:

W - Jump

A D - Movement

Pick up all three batteries hidden throughout each level before your energy runs out. 

When you have all three batteries, walk to the right side of the level to move on to the next stage.
